issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Consolidate the implementation of delete() into a single class

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: HDFS-7573 moves the logSync call inside of the write lock by accident. We should move it out.
fields.summary: FSNamesystem#Delete() should not call logSync() when holding the lock
